video.title: Criminal Minds
video.synopsis: This intense police procedural follows a group of extraordinary FBI profilers who spend their days getting into the minds of psychopathic criminals.

episodes.synopsis: When a fourth woman goes missing in Seattle during the course of four months, the team is brought in to profile her captor.
episodes.title: Extreme Aggressor

episodes.synopsis: When a college campus is terrorized by a serial arsonist, the team attempts to identify the firestarter before he strikes again.
episodes.title: Compulsion

episodes.synopsis: Gideon and his team track down a copycat bomber terrorizing a quiet community.
episodes.title: Won't Get Fooled Again

episodes.synopsis: Gideon and his team must profile a serial rapist and murderer who preys on women in affluent neighborhoods.
episodes.title: Plain Sight

episodes.synopsis: The behavioral analysis unit is called in when the daughter of a U.S. district attorney is kidnapped.
episodes.title: Broken Mirror

episodes.synopsis: he FBI profilers must track down a sniper who is preying on victims in the middle of the day.
episodes.title: L.D.S.K.

episodes.synopsis: The behavioral analysis unit tracks a serial killer who takes families hostage before they leave for vacation.
episodes.title: The Fox

episodes.synopsis: The FBI profilers suspect a serial killer is involved in the disappearance of an undercover cop.
episodes.title: Natural Born Killer

episodes.synopsis: Elle is caught in the crossfire when she and several other passengers are taken hostage on board a train.
episodes.title: Derailed

episodes.synopsis: Gideon and Hotchner investigate whether or not a cult is responsible for the murder of two high school students in a small town.
episodes.title: The Popular Kids

episodes.synopsis: Gideon and Hotchner attempt to identify a killer whose delusional fantasies lead him to commit murder.
episodes.title: Blood Hungry

episodes.synopsis: Gideon, Hotchner and their team investigate the kidnapping of a young girl from a seemingly safe neighborhood playground.
episodes.title: What Fresh Hell?

episodes.synopsis: The FBI profilers investigate a mass poisoning in a small town in order to determine what the common denominator is among the victims.
episodes.title: Poison

episodes.synopsis: Gideon, Hotchner and their team interview husband and wife serial killers awaiting execution on death row.
episodes.title: Riding the Lightning

episodes.synopsis: Gideon, Hotchner and their team attempt to capture a serial killer who has resurfaced after 20 years of silence.
episodes.title: Unfinished Business

episodes.synopsis: Gideon, Hotchner and their team examine the circumstances surrounding the mass murder of five college students killed in an empty house.
episodes.title: The Tribe

episodes.synopsis: Gideon, Hotchner and their team investigate a series of murders that appear to be the work of a vigilante seeking justice for previous crime victims.
episodes.title: A REal Rain

episodes.synopsis: Gideon and Dr. Reid investigate the case of a Hollywood starlet whose stalker turns into a killer.
episodes.title: Somebody's Watching

episodes.synopsis: Gideon, Hotchner and their team head to Mexico to aid in the investigation of a serial killer who preys on the elderly, on CRIMINAL MINDS.
episodes.title: Machismo

episodes.synopsis: A quick change artist on a killing spree takes Gideon, Hotchner and their team on a wild chase throughout the south.
episodes.title: Charm and Harm

episodes.synopsis: The behavioral analysis unit faces one of their toughest challenges yet when they must help identify a double agent working within the CIA.
episodes.title: Secrets and Lies

episodes.synopsis: While on a rare vacation from work, the members of the behavioral analysis team are each sent a highly personal clue that ensnarls them in a mystery.
episodes.title: The Fisher King: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Gideon and the team continue to search for the psychopath who used personal information to ensnarl them in the mystery of a missing young girl.
episodes.title: The Fisher King: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: A former profiler turns to Gideon and his team for help saving a young boy who has turned up in an online auction after disappearing for a year.
episodes.title: P911

episodes.synopsis: Gideon, Hotchner and their team investigate a series of murders that may have been committed by a pair of suspects working together.
episodes.title: The Perfect Storm

episodes.synopsis: The behavioral analysis team investigates a series of bizarre bank robberies in which the robber makes the victims disrobe.
episodes.title: Psychodrama

episodes.synopsis: Gideon, Hotchner and their team profile a serial rapist who has changed tactics in order to continue his crime spree.
episodes.title: Aftermath

episodes.synopsis: The Behavioral Analysis Unit investigates the mysterious deaths of several children in a small town.
episodes.title: The Boogeyman

episodes.synopsis: The abduction of three college women from a small town has the BAU profiling an entire community, rather than an individual offender.
episodes.title: North Mammon

episodes.synopsis: Gideon, Hotchner and their team travel to Seattle in pursuit of a bomber who is targeting places that are technologically advanced.
episodes.title: Empty Planet

episodes.synopsis: Gideon, Hotchner and their team must profile two serial killers in St. Louis who are competing to outdo each other.
episodes.title: The Last Word

episodes.synopsis: Gideon, Reid, and Prentiss travel to Guantanamo Bay to profile a terrorist who has information that could prevent a major terrorist attack in the U.S.
episodes.title: Lessons Learned

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Spencer Rein suspects that a young man who has reached out to him for help may be a serial killer.
episodes.title: Sex, Birth, Death

episodes.synopsis: When Morgan is arrested for murder in Chicago, Gideon, Hotchner and the rest of the team must profile him in an attempt to prove his innocence.
episodes.title: Profiler, Profiled

episodes.synopsis: Gideon and Morgan go head-to-head in a standoff with a prolific serial killer who is curiously calm when they corner him in a diner.
episodes.title: No Way Out

episodes.synopsis: The big game is only beginning for the BAU when they're called to investigate the murder of a wealthy couple after their Super Bowl party.
episodes.title: The Big Game

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team races to find Reid, who has been kidnapped by a serial killer.
episodes.title: Revelations

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team hunts a serial killer they fear is motivated by racism.
episodes.title: Fear and Loathing

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team investigates a series of random murders at construction sites in Houston.
episodes.title: Distress

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team investigates a serial killer who was thought to have been killed during Hurricane Katrina.
episodes.title: Jones

episodes.synopsis: Hotch, Gideon and the BAU team link the arson victims together through corporate development firms accused of building on contaminated land.
episodes.title: Ashes and Dust

episodes.synopsis: Agent Prentiss's mother, a foreign ambassador, enlists the help of the team when a Russian immigrant is kidnapped and held for ransom.
episodes.title: Honor Among Thieves

episodes.synopsis: After determining that the victims had been taken from one place and transported deep into the woods, the BAU team realize their suspects hunt humans.
episodes.title: Open Season

episodes.synopsis: After receiving a tip from a local detective, the team travels to Kansas City to investigate a report of homeless people disappearing from streets.
episodes.title: Legacy

episodes.synopsis: Gideon takes off to hunt an elusive serial killer without telling the BAU, and the team must profile Gideon as a suspect in order to find them both.
episodes.title: No Way Out, Part 2: The Evilution of Frank

episodes.synopsis: The BAU investigates a serial killer who is targeting women on the campus of a small Midwestern college.
episodes.title: Doubt

episodes.synopsis: The future of the BAU is in jeopardy when Hotch requests a transfer, Prentiss resigns, and Gideon goes missing.
episodes.title: In Name and Blood

episodes.synopsis: The unit tracks down a serial killer who exploits his victims' worst fears as a means to kill them.
episodes.title: Scared to Death

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates a crime spree that has escalated from suburban home invasions to murder.
episodes.title: Children of the Dark

episodes.synopsis: When a child is abducted at a mall, the BAU locks down the area and profiles the people at the scene to retrieve the kid before it's too late.
episodes.title: Seven Seconds

episodes.synopsis: The team must find a murderer who posts "Missing" fliers of his victims in advance of kidnapping and killing them.
episodes.title: About Face

episodes.synopsis: One half of a serial-killing duo commits suicide when caught by authorities, and the BAU must race to identify his partner and save a victim.
episodes.title: Identity

episodes.synopsis: The pursuit of a cannibalistic serial killer forces Morgan to question his faith. Meanwhile, Garcia seemingly meets the man of her dreams.
episodes.title: Lucky

episodes.synopsis: The team unites to determine if Garcia's life is being threatened by a serial killer.
episodes.title: Penelope

episodes.synopsis: A famous comic book artist becomes involved in the search for a serial killer in Los Angeles.
episodes.title: True Night

episodes.synopsis: A series of murders in rural Virginia has the BAU team investigating a link between this killing spree and a similar case two decades ago.
episodes.title: Birthright

episodes.synopsis: The team profiles a serial killer who abducts two teenagers and murders one, and who will kill the other if they don't stop him in time.
episodes.title: 3rd Life

episodes.synopsis: When the contents of a self-storage unit reveal the grisly early makings of a serial killer,  the BAU must profile the contents in order to catch him.
episodes.title: Limelight

episodes.synopsis: Rossi decides to revisit an unsolved case from his past and tries to unravel the circumstances behind the mysterious murder of two young parents.
episodes.title: Damaged

episodes.synopsis: When suicide rate spikes in a Pittsburgh neighborhood, the BAU suspects it may be the work of a serial killer who believes he is an "Angel of Death."
episodes.title: A Higher Power

episodes.synopsis: Hotchner and his team investigate a spree of killings in a small Texas town involving a teenage boy and his girlfriend.
episodes.title: Elephant's Memory

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team travels to Miami to profile a serial killer whose sexual identity plays a key role in his choice of victims.
episodes.title: In Heat

episodes.synopsis: Morgan, Prentiss, Reid, and J.J. attempt to stop a stalker before he gets close to the woman who is the object of his affection.
episodes.title: The Crossing

episodes.synopsis: The BAU uses brain fingerprinting to see if a suspected killer who wakes up after long coma really doesn't remember the crimes he allegedly committed.
episodes.title: Tabula Rasa

episodes.synopsis: When people are seemingly shot at random in New York City, the BAU investigates whether a lone serial killer or a team is responsible for the spree.
episodes.title: Lo-Fi

episodes.synopsis: When an SUV carrying members of the BAU explodes, the rest of the team fights to save their colleagues and catch the terrorists responsible.
episodes.title: Mayhem

episodes.synopsis: When recent murders are linked to a serial killer who was executed a year ago, the BAU must find the link between him and the current killing spree.
episodes.title: The Angel Maker

episodes.synopsis: Prentiss and Reid go undercover to investigate possible child abuse at an underground cult and get trapped inside the compound when a raid goes bad.
episodes.title: Minimal Loss

episodes.synopsis: A serial killer who disguises his victims' demise by creating car accidents to mask their earlier deaths is the subject of a BAU manhunt.
episodes.title: Paradise

episodes.synopsis: A serial killer who jumps trains and targets people living near the railway is the subject of a BAU manhunt. Meta Golding guest stars.
episodes.title: Catching Out

episodes.synopsis: While investigating the kidnapping of a young boy in Las Vegas, Reid begins to have dreams that may help reveal buried memories from his childhood.
episodes.title: The Instincts

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Reid embarks on his own investigation into the murder of a young boy years earlier that he believes has a connection to his childhood.
episodes.title: Memoriam

episodes.synopsis: The team must profile a serial killer who turns himself in, but sends them on a massive manhunt to find his latest victims before it's too late.
episodes.title: Masterpiece

episodes.synopsis: Agents Prentiss and Todd go undercover to profile a pickup artist who uses his skills of persuasion to lure women into danger.
episodes.title: 52 Pickup

episodes.synopsis: A BAU case hits close to home for Morgan when a serial killer specifically focuses on members of the police force in Phoenix, Ariz.
episodes.title: Brothers in Arms

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates a serial killer who kills luxury car owners while they are driving on freeways in Southern California.
episodes.title: Normal

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team suspects a member of an affluent community in Atlanta is responsible for the disappearance of a local young woman.
episodes.title: Soul Mates

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team becomes involved in the case of a family working together to abduct young women.
episodes.title: Bloodline

episodes.synopsis: Agents Hotchner and Rossi track a suspect who abducts, kills and embalms his victims in order to spend more time with them.
episodes.title: Cold Comfort

episodes.synopsis: The team pursues a copycat serial killer who is re-creating the techniques used by past famous murderers.
episodes.title: Zoe's Reprise

episodes.synopsis: The team searches for a female suspect who uses her professional skills as a high-class call girl to lure and kill high-powered executives.
episodes.title: Pleasure Is My Business

episodes.synopsis: Agent Prentiss has a personal connection to one of the victims in a series of deaths with religious overtones.
episodes.title: Demonology

episodes.synopsis: Hotch revisits the first case he worked at the BAU when one of the deadliest serial killers in New England's history strikes after a 10-year hiatus.
episodes.title: Omnivore

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team must track down a serial arsonist who instills fear in a small town by setting fire to community meeting places.
episodes.title: House on Fire

episodes.synopsis: The team travels to South Padre Island during spring break to find a serial killer who is targeting college students on vacation.
episodes.title: Conflicted

episodes.synopsis: When profiling a series of child murders, the team discovers that one of the cases may not be the handiwork of the serial killer they apprehended.
episodes.title: A Shade of Gray

episodes.synopsis: When the team is sent a videotape from a serial killer, they discover a hidden message asking them to help him stop his murderous ways.
episodes.title: The Big Wheel

episodes.synopsis: An unknown subject who kills with his car is the subject of a BAU investigation.
episodes.title: Roadkill

episodes.synopsis: When a new type of chemical warfare is released into the open air, the BAU must act quickly to find the source before any more people are exposed.
episodes.title: Amplification

episodes.synopsis: The BAU tracks a serial killer who takes junkies, prostitutes, and the homeless across the border into Canada, and an agent's life is in peril.
episodes.title: To Hell..

episodes.synopsis: The BAU tracks a serial killer who takes junkies, prostitutes, and the homeless across the border into Canada, and an agent's life is in peril.
episodes.title: ...And Back

episodes.synopsis: Hotch's unexplained absence quickly becomes apparent when the team is called back together to profile a killer who is targeting an ER doctor.
episodes.title: Faceless, Nameless

episodes.synopsis: When a disturbed man kills several people at a pharmacy, the BAU must figure out what triggered his actions before he hurts anyone else.
episodes.title: Haunted

episodes.synopsis: The BAU investigates a case in Rossi's hometown that involves both his personal and professional life.
episodes.title: Reckoner

episodes.synopsis: The BAU investigates a group of thrill-seeking suspects with a pack mentality who are randomly selecting their victims in the nation's capital.
episodes.title: Hopeless

episodes.synopsis: The team hunts a suspect who impregnates his victims and then forces them to give birth before murdering them.
episodes.title: Cradle to Grave

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team tracks a serial killer who keeps the eyes of his victims as souvenirs.
episodes.title: The Eyes Have It

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team follows a trail of murders that seems to align with the tour schedule of a strange rock star.
episodes.title: The Performer

episodes.synopsis: While tracking a family annihilator, the BAU must seek advice from one of the most horrific killers from the team's past.
episodes.title: Outfoxed

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team races to help Hotchner find The Reaper and save his family before it's too late.
While Agent Hotchner takes a leave of absence from the BAU, the team must regroup to solve a home invasion case.
episodes.title: The Slave Of Duty

episodes.synopsis: The BAU must profile a criminal's past in order to catch him after he escapes from custody and begins a killing spree.
episodes.title: Retaliation

episodes.synopsis: An unusual personal obsession is at the center of a BAU abduction case. Meanwhile, Hotch struggles with his return to work.
episodes.title: The Uncanny Valley

episodes.synopsis: A rash of startling teen suicides in a small Wyoming town is the focus of a BAU investigation.
episodes.title: Risky Business

episodes.synopsis: The BAU follows the mental decline of a con artist whose schemes have become so complicated that he begins to eliminate the people involved in them.
episodes.title: Parasite

episodes.synopsis: A serial killer who targets random victims in highly visible places to create a sense of public fear is the subject of a BAU investigation.
episodes.title: Public Enemy

episodes.synopsis: The BAU profiles a child abductor who may have been keeping children for more than eight years.
episodes.title: Mosley Lane

episodes.synopsis: A truck driver is kidnapping women and disposing of them in random locations, and the BAU must find out his motive in order to catch him.
episodes.title: Solitary Man

episodes.synopsis: The team travels to San Francisco to investigate the murders of several homeless men and teams up with a separate BAU group.
episodes.title: The Fight

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team heads to Texas to track a serial killer targeting illegal immigrants who are attempting to make safe passage into the United States.
episodes.title: Rite Of Passage

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team must profile a serial killer covered in tattoos who commits suicide, but leaves clues to the whereabouts of his last victim.
episodes.title: ...A Thousand Words

episodes.synopsis: Garcia plays a crucial role in a case when she travels to Alaska with the BAU team to investigate the murders of several residents of a small town.
episodes.title: Exit Wounds

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team profiles a serial killer who uses the Internet as his hunting ground, bringing a whole new meaning to the term "social networking."
episodes.title: The Internet Is Forever

episodes.synopsis: A series of rolling blackouts in Los Angeles lures a serial killer out of hiding, giving him renewed opportunities to continue his killing spree.
episodes.title: Our Darkest Hour

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team closes in on the serial killer as he continues his murder spree throughout Los Angeles - with Spicer's kidnapped daughter as his hostage.
episodes.title: Longest Night

episodes.synopsis: While JJ attempts to reunite a family whose daughter has mysteriously disappeared, her BAU family braces for the loss of one of their own.
episodes.title: JJ

episodes.synopsis: When several women are found murdered in a similar fashion, Rossi revisits a cold case that has haunted him for 25 years.
episodes.title: Remembrance Of Things Past

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team searches for a serial killer who is preying on married couples. Also, Hotchner looks to one of the team to fill JJ's vacant role.
episodes.title: Compromising Positions

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team is on the trail of a serial killer targeting families throughout the Midwest.
episodes.title: Safe Haven

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team must find a killer who has struck Detroit for the past three years solely during the raucous pre-Halloween celebration Devil's Night.
episodes.title: Devil's Night

episodes.synopsis: When bodies begin turning up in the cornfields of Indiana, the BAU team must catch a pack of serial killers targeting exotic dancers.
episodes.title: Middle Man

episodes.synopsis: When a kidnapped woman is found murdered in an alley in Georgetown, the BAU team goes on the hunt for the killer before he can strike again.
episodes.title: Reflection Of Desire

episodes.synopsis: When an 8-year-old is found murdered on the Appalachian Trail, the BAU goes deep into its forests in search of a man lurking in the wilderness.
episodes.title: Into The Woods

episodes.synopsis: The BAU searches inside a gated New Mexico community for a killer targeting women, and Hotch looks to an FBI cadet with a unique past for help.
episodes.title: What Happens At Home...

episodes.synopsis: Morgan suggests that a prisoner is ready for parole, but later regrets his decision when the man murders someone days after being released.
episodes.title: 25 To Life

episodes.synopsis: As the BAU travels to Miami to investigate a series of bizarre, ritualistic murders, Reid suffers a series of blinding headaches and hallucinations.
episodes.title: Corazon

episodes.synopsis: The BAU hits the road to track down a pair of young lovers on an interstate murder spree, and Prentiss hears frightening news from her former boss.
episodes.title: The Thirteenth Step

episodes.synopsis: The BAU travels to Los Angeles to investigate unusual murders throughout the city. Also, more of Prentiss's mysterious past comes to light.
episodes.title: Sense Memory

episodes.synopsis: The BAU is called to upstate New York to investigate mysterious disappearances.
episodes.title: Today I Do

episodes.synopsis: Reid makes a connection with an autistic child that could assist the BAU in finding the boy's missing parents.
episodes.title: Coda

episodes.synopsis: After a series of suspicious murders occur, Prentiss suspects her old Interpol nemesis.
episodes.title: Valhalla

episodes.synopsis: Prentiss is ready to confront her nemesis, Ian Doyle, once and for all.
episodes.title: Lauren

episodes.synopsis: When a gang of suspected murderers begins targeting a new victim each night, the BAU travels to Portland to head them off.
episodes.title: With Friends Like These..

episodes.synopsis: As the BAU investigates targeted killings in Tampa, they also deal with their own feelings about the loss of Prentiss.
episodes.title: Hanley Waters

episodes.synopsis: The BAU hunts a stalker in San Diego who is targeting college students. Meanwhile, the team comes under scrutiny in the wake of the loss of Prentiss.
episodes.title: The Stranger

episodes.synopsis: The BAU is called to a North Carolina mountain town after a woman is found badly injured and another is missing.
episodes.title: Out Of The Light

episodes.synopsis: The BAU is Florida-bound to investigate bodies discovered buried in the ocean floor, but the case suddenly hits close to home for Morgan.
episodes.title: Big Sea

episodes.synopsis: The bodies of two missing persons are found in a car trunk, and the BAU suspects that an interstate human trafficking ring is at work.
episodes.title: Supply & Demand

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team is at a crossroads as they are questioned by a Senate Committee for their retaliatory actions in the wake of Prentiss' loss, but an unexpected familiar face could help them win their case and keep the team together.
episodes.title: It Takes A Village

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team searches rural Oklahoma when women are being found murdered after being robbed of one of their five senses. Also, JJ and Prentiss get the cold shoulder from Reid as he deals with their deception about Prentiss' presumed death.
episodes.title: Proof

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team investigates a mass murder at an Internet security company in Charlottesville, Va., but clues reveal it is not a typical serial killer at work. Also, Prentiss must complete recertification training under Morgan's watchful eye.
episodes.title: Dorado Falls

episodes.synopsis: Survivors of a Boise high school massacre return to remember the event 10 years later, but the BAU team is called in when a new killer with a similar style targets the survivors.
episodes.title: Painless

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team searches for children being abducted in St. Louis, and Rossi receives shocking news from his first wife.
episodes.title: From Childhood's Hour

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team searches a California mountain lake when bodies mysteriously turn up there, and Rossi struggles with a decision regarding his ex-wife.
episodes.title: Epilogue

episodes.synopsis: After a series of tornadoes hit Kansas, the BAU searches Wichita when bodies turn up in the aftermath of the storms, and JJ faces pressure on both the work and home fronts.
episodes.title: There's No Place Like Home

episodes.synopsis: A case turns personal for Garcia when a friend of hers goes missing seven years to the day after her daughter disappeared.
episodes.title: Hope

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team investigates the real reason behind an apparent mass suicide at a military academy.
episodes.title: Self-Fulfilling Prophecy

episodes.synopsis: The BAU searches the boxing scene in Philadelphia for a killer with a blood lust, and hotch makes a connection with a fellow triathlete.
episodes.title: The Bittersweet Science

episodes.synopsis: A series of murders in San Francisco bearing the marks of the infamous Zodiac Killer have the BAUwondering if the notorious serial killer is back.
episodes.title: True Genius

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team finds discord in Houston when a rapist known as "the piano man" returns to assault his previous victims.
episodes.title: Unknown Subject

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team tries to beat the house when they investigate a series of casino-related murders in Atlantic city, and Garcia wonders if she and Morgan became too friendly after a fight with her boyfriend.
episodes.title: Snake Eyes

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team hits some rough surf when they investigate bodies found in southern California lifeguard towers.
episodes.title: Closing Time

episodes.synopsis: When brutal home invasions in the California suburbs appear gang-related, the BAU team thinks that more devious motives could be at work.
episodes.title: A Thin Line

episodes.synopsis: The heat is on in Atlanta when the BAU investigates murders of women and realizes they're looking for more than one unsub.
episodes.title: A Family Affair

episodes.synopsis: The BAU team investigates the murders of married couples in Seattle, and Garcia fears a proposal from Kevin is imminent.
episodes.title: I Love You, Tommy Brown

episodes.synopsis: When a young boy is found wandering in the Arizona desert and another child disappears, the BAU team goes on the hunt for the kidnapper.
episodes.title: Foundation

episodes.synopsis: The BAU is in for a ghost of a time when the team investigates a series of ritualistic murders in Oregon.
episodes.title: Heathridge Manor

episodes.synopsis: When his missing cousin reappears, Morgan is forced to confront a lie he told to protect his family and makes the BAU team reopen the file on her disappearance.
episodes.title: The Company

episodes.synopsis: When a serial murderer is executed, a copycat emerges in Oklahoma, and the BAU team must act swiftly.
episodes.title: Divining Rod

episodes.synopsis: Rossi and the team teach college students about the science of criminal profiling, as they look back on a serial killing case that spanned nearly 20 years.
episodes.title: Profiling 101

episodes.synopsis: The BAU goes up against a gang of bank robbing serial killers, and the stakes rise when one of their own becomes a hostage, on the first part of the two-hour seventh season finale.
episodes.title: Hit

episodes.synopsis: The BAU continues to negotiate with the serial killing bank robbers, one of the team gets married and Prentiss ponders her future, on the conclusion of the two-hour seventh season finale.
episodes.title: Run

episodes.synopsis: The team tracks an escaped Texas inmate whose victims bear his unique trademark: Their mouths are sewn shut.
episodes.title: The Silencer

episodes.synopsis: When the bodies of two ostensibly unrelated victims are discovered, the team suspects that two killers worked together to carry out the murders.
episodes.title: The Pact

episodes.synopsis: The team races against time to find a connection between two Kansas families -- one murdered and the other abducted.
episodes.title: Through the Looking Glass

episodes.synopsis: When a legless body is discovered in the New Mexico desert, the team is brought in to pursue a surgeon who's performing needless amputations.
episodes.title: God Complex

episodes.synopsis: When four men disappear in rural Oregon, the team attempts to track them down by finding a common link among them.
episodes.title: The Good Earth

episodes.synopsis: When hookers in Miami are murdered in a style similar to a rash of animal slayings, the team must work fast to find the increasingly confident killer.
episodes.title: The Apprenticeship

episodes.synopsis: The team travels to Santa Monica, Calif., when the burned bodies of homeless people turn up near the city's famous pier.
episodes.title: The Fallen

episodes.synopsis: The team goes in search of a school bus full of students that has vanished near Washington, D.C.
episodes.title: The Wheels on the Bus..

episodes.synopsis: When a follower of a well-known motivational speaker is murdered in Seattle, the team suspects the orator -- until he vanishes.
episodes.title: Magnificent Light

episodes.synopsis: A number of male bodies disposed of in bizarre, ritualistic ways sends the team to Winslow, Ariz., in search of the killer.
episodes.title: The Lesson

episodes.synopsis: The team travels south to investigate a suspect whose signature is identical to that of a serial killer whose crimes were committed 30 years earlier.
episodes.title: Perennials

episodes.synopsis: When Reid learns that his girlfriend has been abducted by her stalker, he and the team band together to save her before it's too late.
episodes.title: Zugzwang

episodes.synopsis: While Reid copes with a personal loss, the rest of the team goes to San Francisco to investigate a string of murders in the Mission District.
episodes.title: Magnum Opus

episodes.synopsis: The team heads to Maryland to profile an author whose wife mysteriously disappeared a year ago -- and whose daughters have just vanished.
episodes.title: All That Remains

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates when murder victims in Austin, Texas, are found with their watches set incorrectly -- a clue that may link the crimes.
episodes.title: Broken

episodes.synopsis: The team gets a break in their pursuit of the Replicator -- the BAU's stalker -- when murder victims turn up in Philadelphia.
episodes.title: Carbon Copy

episodes.synopsis: In St. Paul, Minn., the team investigates the murders of people who were documenting their personal lives and desires on blogs and social media.
episodes.title: The Gathering

episodes.synopsis: While on the trail of a killer in Chicago, Morgan comes to believe that the suspect may be linked to the person who molested him as a child.
episodes.title: Restoration

episodes.synopsis: When the opening of a time capsule results in a grisly discovery, the team looks into a potential link to a police officer's death.
episodes.title: Pay It Forward

episodes.synopsis: The ritualistic murder and dismemberment of two young males sends the team to Rapid City, S.D., to investigate.
episodes.title: Alchemy

episodes.synopsis: In Los Angeles, the team profiles a suspect who abducts nannies and the children in their care on the same date every year.
episodes.title: Nanny Dearest

episodes.synopsis: The team heads to Detroit to probe a pair of murders in which the victims ended up in the trunks of their vehicles.
When the team probes a series of deaths tied to apparent ecstasy overdoses, Hotch learns that his estranged brother may be involved.
episodes.title: Brothers Hotchner

episodes.synopsis: When the Replicator targets a team member as his next victim, the unit must thwart the cunning killer before he can carry out his end game.
episodes.title: The Replicator

episodes.synopsis: The BAU searches for a serial killer in Glendale, Arizona, and the team believes that Hotch is being groomed to replace the late Erin Strauss.
episodes.title: The Inspiration: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As the BAU close in on the culprit in ritualistic murders in Arizona, they encounter their suspect's mother, who is obviously keeping secrets.
episodes.title: The Inspiration: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Sniper attacks in Dallas lead the BAU to consider that the incident is motivated by the approaching anniversary of the Kennedy assassination.
episodes.title: Final Shot

episodes.synopsis: Mateo Cruz is named section chief over the BAU as the team hunts for a sadistic perp in Baltimore who renders his victims unable to communicate.
episodes.title: To Bear Witness

episodes.synopsis: As a critically wounded Hotch hallucinates moments from his past, the BAU question a man whose estranged teenage daughter has disappeared.
episodes.title: Route 66

episodes.synopsis: Clues in a series of ritualistic murders in Utah remind the BAU of the Salem witch trials, and Garcia hosts a Day of the Dead party.
episodes.title: In the Blood

episodes.synopsis: The BAU searches for a common trait among Boston strangling victims, and Rossi mourns the impending closure of his favorite bar.
episodes.title: Gatekeeper

episodes.synopsis: The BAU thinks that missing Chicago teens may be behind a killing spree; Morgan has a hard time accepting his girlfriend's devotion to her work.
episodes.title: The Return

episodes.synopsis: Shameful family secrets come to light when human remains turn up in the backyard of a home in Virginia.
episodes.title: Strange Fruit

episodes.synopsis: When a young boy disappears from his St. Louis home, the BAU finds connections to a cold case from years earlier.
episodes.title: The Caller

episodes.synopsis: A BAU investigation into a string of murders in Kansas City reunites Blake with her estranged father, a retired cop, and brother, a detective.
episodes.title: Bully

episodes.synopsis: Garcia reconnects with an old flame and fellow hacker in hopes of getting help with a BAU murder investigation in San Jose.
episodes.title: The Black Queen

episodes.synopsis: Rossi leaves for Los Angeles to search for his former Marine sergeant, who's vanished, while the rest of the BAU searches for a killer in Cleveland.
episodes.title: The Road Home

episodes.synopsis: When JJ is kidnapped, the BAU calls in Prentiss to assist and searches for leads in her missions for the state department.
The BAU realizes that they're actually looking for two culprits in a string of murders in Pittsburgh; Garcia and Morgan make Valentine's Day plans.
episodes.title: Mr. and Mrs. Anderson

episodes.synopsis: The BAU reveals some shocking family secrets while investigating the disappearance of a four-year-old girl from a relative's home in Mississippi.
episodes.title: Gabby

episodes.synopsis: The BAU investigates when a series of bodies turn up in the middle of the Las Vegas desert -- all victims of drowning.
episodes.title: Persuasion

episodes.synopsis: Bodies covered with bite marks -- both animal and human -- turn up in a shallow grave outside Milwaukee; Garcia and Reid prepare for a fitness exam.
episodes.title: Rabid

episodes.synopsis: The BAU is closing an investigation into a stabbing spree in upstate New York when the lone survivor offers information that changes everything.
episodes.title: The Edge of Winter

episodes.synopsis: The BAU discovers a long-standing feud between a pair of rural clans when two bodies are found in the back woods of West Virginia.
episodes.title: Blood Relations

episodes.synopsis: The BAU looks for a common element in a series of abductions in Memphis; Savannah confronts Morgan about being gone all the time.
episodes.title: What Happens in Mecklinburg

episodes.synopsis: A killer with a penchant for ancient Greek philosophy brings the BAU to Long Beach, California, and Hotch prepares for Jack's third grade Career Day.
episodes.title: Fatal

episodes.synopsis: The BAU members are caught in the crossfire while investigating the religiously motivated murders of several prostitutes in Texas.
episodes.title: Angels

episodes.synopsis: As they dig deeper into the Texas prostitute murders, the BAU discovers that the killer has a greater -- and much deadlier -- ambition.
episodes.title: Demons
